text: Pen nad God bɨne yɨbɨl ak, bɨ ogɨnap gɨ tɨmel gɨpal tek ma gɨnɨmɨn. Tap nɨm ak pen anɨgɨnɨmɨn. Bɨ teplep yɨbɨl mɨdɨl, God anɨgup tek ak kɨles gɨl mɨdɨl, Klays nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, binɨb okok kɨlop mapen lɨl, kɨles tɨmel gɨl mɨŋel okok dɨl, tap okok binɨb okok kɨlop gɨnɨg, kɨmɨgel gɨnɨmɨn. Adek anɨb ak nep ge amnɨmuŋ.
